name: TURRET TO EARTH
description:
Hi,

I am the chief of staff of oedipe games which means i am the chief of myself...

I managed somehow to make this 3d third person shooter game. You will be  gunner in this well made asset of mine( thanks to blender). You will to beat my record and i hope you will!! You will enjoy some good special effect at the screen!

The story

You are the captain of a defense tower in sector that SINK!! Where? To the hell my friend!! While you are sinking some dangerous and actually big demon come to attack you and your team gunners!

Fire at them with all your big shell and make them go to....HELL!!

It is really easy to use:

The mouse to make it rotate around itself .

Left mouse button to fire the rounds.

Press ENTER to get out of this(ESCAPE)!

All input are on screen don't worry!

If the game is a success maybe i will come back to it and make it greater again!!

MUSIC is a NO COPIRIGHT ONE: Epic_Cinematic_Music_Empire_Royalty_Free

You can find it on YOUTUBE.
